snippet.title: Fallout London - Official Release Announcement
snippet.description:
- 𝗙𝗔𝗟𝗟𝗢𝗨𝗧: 𝗟𝗢𝗡𝗗𝗢𝗡 -
𝗙𝗮𝗹𝗹𝗼𝘂𝘁: 𝗟𝗼𝗻𝗱𝗼𝗻 - 𝐎𝐟𝐟𝐢𝐜𝐢𝐚𝐥 𝐑𝐞𝐥𝐞𝐚𝐬𝐞 𝐀𝐧𝐧𝐨𝐮𝐧𝐜𝐞𝐦𝐞𝐧𝐭
_________________________________________________________________
- 𝗦𝗨𝗣𝗣𝗢𝗥𝗧 𝗧𝗛𝗘 𝗧𝗘𝗔𝗠 -
Many of you have asked how you can support us, and guess what? We're now finally on Paypal, Patreon and Ko-FI!

𝐃𝐨𝐧𝐚𝐭𝐞: https://fallout4london.com/donate/
𝗣𝗮𝘁𝗿𝗲𝗼𝗻: https://patreon.com/TeamFOLON
𝐊𝐨-𝐅𝐈: https://ko-fi.com/teamfolon

𝐖𝐚𝐧𝐭 𝐭𝐨 𝐬𝐩𝐨𝐧𝐬𝐨𝐫 𝐮𝐬?
Contact us on: Fallout4London@gmail.com 
_________________________________________________________________
Fallout: London is a DLC-sized mod for Bethesda’s Fallout 4. As a continuation of the base game, the mod will allow the player to visit the previously unexplored post-apocalyptic environment of London.

As a divergence from previous official titles in the series, Fallout: London is not set in America. Visiting a totally new setting allows for us to explore totally new cultures which have not homogenized with their American counterparts. It also allows us to explore pre-war European history, and the effects the Resource Wars had on the class structured society of pre-war Britain.

Team FOLON® operates as an independent entity responsible for the development of the Fallout: London mod for Bethesda's Fallout 4™ game. We want to emphasize that Team FOLON® is a separate legal entity from Bethesda™, the publisher of Fallout 4™.

- 𝗩𝗜𝗗𝗘𝗢 𝗖𝗥𝗘𝗗𝗜𝗧𝗦 -
Video and Logo: SunnyDelight / C3Delight
https://www.artstation.com/c3delight

- 𝗖𝗢𝗡𝗧𝗘𝗡𝗧 𝗖𝗥𝗘𝗗𝗜𝗧𝗦 -
𝗔𝘂𝗱𝗶𝗼:
General Audio - Daniel Morrison Neil
https://soundcloud.com/danielismakingmsomemusic/dansky

𝗡𝗮𝗿𝗿𝗮𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻:
Voice Actor - Drew Faithwaite
https://drewfaithwaite.com/

𝗖𝗵𝗮𝗿𝗮𝗰𝘁𝗲𝗿𝘀:
Westminster Palace Guard - CallMeKevin
https://www.youtube.com/@UCdoPCztTOW7BJUPk2h5ttXA 

The Mend - Dan Bull
https://www.youtube.com/@UC1hkAIJnb2CSmm7SPJaPR-A 

John Smith - Martin Lovell
https://www.martinlovell.myportfolio.com

The Ferryman - Chris Dunlap
https://www.backstage.com/u/chris-dunlap/

Smythe - Ciaran Saward
https://www.ciaransawardvo.com/

BBM Radio Host - Peter Rugman
https://www.spotlight.com/3419-0164-0877

Crystal Palace Radio - Emma Stanley

_________________________________________________________________
𝗦𝗽𝗲𝗰𝗶𝗮𝗹 𝘁𝗵𝗮𝗻𝗸𝘀:
Heavy Burns: https://www.youtube.com/@UCmzsPO2611HRdlUWXocoixw 
Skyblivion:https://www.youtube.com/@UCZeO7KWB8iYmhnKB53oY3pw 
Without his templates and advice this video wouldn't have been possible!

Shot with ENB (Vanilla - No preset) | Reshade| And Marty Mcflys Ray traced global illumination
_________________________________________________________________
- 𝗦𝗨𝗣𝗣𝗢𝗥𝗧 𝗧𝗛𝗘 𝗧𝗘𝗔𝗠 -
𝐃𝐨𝐧𝐚𝐭𝐞: https://fallout4london.com/donate/
𝗣𝗮𝘁𝗿𝗲𝗼𝗻: https://patreon.com/TeamFOLON
𝐊𝐨-𝐅𝐈: https://ko-fi.com/teamfolon
 
- 𝗟𝗜𝗡𝗞𝗦 -
Discord: https://discord.gg/GtmKaR8
Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/TeamFOLON
Ko-FI: https://ko-fi.com/teamfolon
Youtube: www.youtube.com/falloutlondon
Facebook: www.facebook.com/FalloutLondon/
Website: http://www.fallout4london.com
Subreddit: http://reddit.com/r/fallout4london
Twitter: https://twitter.com/falloutlondon
Instagram: @Fallout4London
Hashtag: #FalloutLondon AND #Fallout4London

Thanks for watching, and as always;
Mind the Gap.

- Fallout: London Development Team
